titles: Buffalo shooting: Ten dead in attack at supermarket in New York state
descriptions: A suspect is arrested over the attack, which is being investigated as a racially-motivated hate crime.

titles: Eurovision 2022: Ukraine wins, while the UK's Sam Ryder comes second
descriptions: Ukraine's Kalush Orchestra triumphs, while Sam Ryder gives the UK its best result since 1998.

titles: Ukraine war: Putin warns Finland joining Nato would be 'mistake'
descriptions: Finland and Sweden have indicated they want to become Nato members following Russia's war in Ukraine.

titles: North Korea: Covid outbreak a great disaster, says Kim Jong-un
descriptions: North Korea's leader blames the outbreak on bureaucratic and medical incompetence.

titles: Shireen Abu Aqla: UN condemns killing of Al Jazeera reporter
descriptions: Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead in disputed circumstances in the occupied West Bank.

titles: Delhi office fire: Dozens killed as fire sweeps through building
descriptions: Most of those inside were women, leaving families frantically searching for news of their fate.

titles: Nigeria student killing: Round-the-clock curfew in Sokoto after protests
descriptions: Demonstrators have been demanding the release of two suspects held over the murder of a Christian student.

titles: Rome Open: Iga Swiatek beats Aryna Sabalenka to reach Rome Open final
descriptions: Iga Swiatek extends her winning run to 27 matches and moves within one victory of a fifth consecutive title by reaching the Italian Open final.

titles: Kenyan fighting FGM crowned world's best nurse
descriptions: Anna Qabale Duba says the $250,000 prize money will help expand her school for children and adults.

titles: Mao Zedong scroll thieves jailed in Hong Kong
descriptions: The thieves were unaware of its value and sold it to an amateur collector for less than $25 (Â£20).

titles: Brittney Griner: US basketball star has Russian detention extended
descriptions: Russian media says Moscow wishes to "swap" Griner for the arms trafficker Viktor Bout.

titles: Elon Musk puts Twitter deal on hold over fake account details
descriptions: The billionaire wants more data on fake accounts, prompting speculation over the deal's future.

titles: Covid: What will the pandemic look like in North Korea?
descriptions: North Korea is uniquely vulnerable to the virus, and the options to control its spread are limited.

titles: East Africa drought: 'The suffering here has no equal'
descriptions: Some 20 million people face severe hunger but aid agencies say the world's attention is on Ukraine.

titles: Ukraine conflict: Russian soldiers seen killing unarmed civilians
descriptions: The incident, captured on video seen by the BBC, is being investigated as a suspected war crime.

titles: Sri Lanka crisis: How war heroes became villains
descriptions: The Rajapaksa brothers, hailed by many as heroes for winning the civil war, are now reviled as leaders.

titles: Afghanistan pupils in fear after spate of Islamic State attacks
descriptions: A spate of Islamic State attacks have left Afghan students in fear and test Taliban security claims.

titles: Eurovision 2022: Highlights of Ukraine's winning night
descriptions: Ukraine won the Eurovision song contest 2022, with the UK coming second, its best result since 1998.

titles: Fleeing Syria 10 years on: 'We cried all the way to Jordan'
descriptions: A family looks back after a decade living in the world's largest Syrian refugee camp.

titles: Roe v Wade: Thousands attend rallies in US cities to support abortion rights
descriptions: Pro-choice supporters are concerned that the Supreme Court could overturn the legal right to abortion.

titles: Violence at Al Jazeera journalist's funeral procession
descriptions: Police with riot gear hit mourners, saying they were pelted with stones, as crowds carry her coffin.

titles: Custom-made brace helps heal baby giraffe
descriptions: Vets in San Diego, California, came up with a creative solution to treat a young calf's limb disorder.
